WRITING.TEXT: I used to be afraid of going to hell too and then I thought about it and came to the conclusion that if there is a god, that he wouldn't do that to the people he created. Being afraid to go to hell when you die is a mental prison.

Decrease of omega 3 and an increase in grains?

Is this really how farming is going to be? I know that conventional farming isn't going to last, but this is the next step, artificial growing? What about permaculture or food forest?

I wish he was still around, funny as hell and told the truth. I don't see how the people who run this country sleep at night. I feel bad if I lie to one person during my day, couldn't imagine lying to millions on a daily basis.

No I didn't disagree with that. But what I took from it was let's design a candidate that we can all agree on. Just saying 'I want a politician that isn't corrupt' isn't enough in my opinion. State what you would like to see in a potential candidate and go from there.

Well let's make one up, let's build the ideal presidential candidate and what she/he would stand for. What qualities would you like your presidential candidate to have?
I'll start: I would like my president to support universal health care and see to it that it is fully implemented in the U.S.
